mapper.select: select t.rule_item_id, t.rule_out_id, t.rule_order, t.rule_name, t.order_type, t.order_biz_type, t.pack_level, t.target_pack_level, t.quality, t.loc_expr, t.stock_match_mode, t.is_enable, t.create_at, t.create_by, t.update_at, t.update_by from rule_out_items t where t.is_enable = 1 --@ AND t.rule_item_id = #{rule_item_id} --@ AND t.rule_out_id = #{rule_out_id}
